data.name: FTP Output
data.xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="direct:{{source}}"/>
    {{applyUnmarshal input_format input_format_options}}
    {{setHeader "Exchange.CONTENT_TYPE" content_type "constant"}}
    <toD uri="{{protocol}}://{{username}}@{{hostname}}:{{port}}/{{directoryname}}?password={{password}}&fileName={{filename}}&{{querystring query_params extra_query_params true}}"/>
    {{applyUnmarshal output_format output_format_options}}
    {{applyMarshal output_format output_format_options}}
    {{generateDestination target}}
</route>
